title: About PONKAN-APPLE
description: A weird branded mix of almost anything.
body:
Here at Ponkan-Apple… You will be seeing topics that are generally about Technologies that could help achieve specific tasks.
Contents like  Tips and tricks for solving tasks, valuable  security tips, recent  tech news, and  fun experiments.
This site will basically be a  record of what we learn and want to  share with you out there.
 The NAME and The Logo   PONKAN-APPLE    Ponkan Apple! Bili na kayo! Ponkan Apple…
– A Fruit Vendor in a fast moving vehicle
 The rest is history…
 Contacts us SLICE OF CODE IT CONSULTANCY provides various Tech Services. We are experienced in finding the ways to utilize technologies while maximizing available  resource’s value.
Our Mission is to solve tech problems within the available resources. This will contribute to our Vision, that is, for everyone to get access to the best technology available without reliance on üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è software piracy.
View other Contact information here. Learn more and contribute on our  Facebook page.
  Resources and Attributions  Inkscape - a Free and open source vector graphics editor for GNU/Linux, Windows and MacOS X. GIMP - a cross-platform image editor available for GNU/Linux, OS X, Windows and more operating systems. Images  Model of Ponkan by Mae Mu Model of Apple by Sincerely Media
